title: I'm So F*** Sick Of Players That Don't Understand BARON CALLS!
body: How fuc**** hard is understanding that when  the enemy jungler is down past the 20 minutes mark, you go for that goddam OBJECTIVE!!! And if the enemy team contests, YOU TURN ON THEIR A$$ES, NOT DIE IN THE PIT!!!! I swear this is the dumbest sh*t I see in all my games!!! Brains in 2016........

replies.body: Yeah go tank Baron at 20 minutes just because their jungler is dead the "turn on them" when they show up with everyone below half HP. Good job.
Are you serious right now? 5 men tanking, plus a top laner in the current meta (POPPY, NAUTIUS Or MAOKAI). Do you want links of videos on Youtube?
No, you just make bad Baron calls lol.

Oh really? Because last time I checked, if 5 men can't tank a baron past the 20min mark or have the judgement to turn on a possible contest, they are straight up garbage. Just saying. And I didn't mention the warding that was done before because it's goddam too obvious to do if you use your brain.
Why are you calling people "straight up garbage" when you're bronze 4 lol
Because I admit I'm garbage, but obvious decisions like those are just... You shouldn't have to think to make them.

What drives me crazy are people that rush baron in a 4v5 situation with the other team all MIA. 9 out of 10 times they give the other team free baron, ace and game.

Most of the time, the time spent taking baron is better spent pushing (if you aced) or defending (if you did not).
Oh my goodness, you're one of them. You clearly missed the part where I mentionned: TURN WHEN YOU SEE THEM! ........

Yes, you turn - and get trashed in a fair 4v5 fight because half your team is at half HP with baron armor shred and boxed into the pit with no room to move.

I see it all the time.
Oh well... Really disappointed in the general answers I've seen so far... Feels like players assume their team is complete garbage and can't tank a baron properly...
Experience suggests that yes, the team _is_ complete garbage.
